arts.ttl: ‘Back on the grass’: Everton get Double Fitness Boost Ahead of Manchester City Game
arts.sum: Everton have received a double injury boost ahead of tomorrow’s trip to the Etihad Stadium. Manager David Moyes today confirmed that both Jarrad Branthwaite and Merlin Rohl are ‘back on the grass’. Branthwaite is yet to feature this season, with Michael Keane partnering James Tarkowski in his absence. The 23-year-old committed his future to the club with a new contract during the summer, but has been absent for three months. Rohl meanwhile has played just once since his arrival from […] The post ‘Back on the grass’: Everton get Double Fitness Boost Ahead of Manchester City Game appeared first on Grand Old Team.

arts.ttl: A key player for Manchester City is ruled out of their clash with Everton
arts.sum: Manchester City take on Everton tomorrow at the Etihad Stadium as the Premier League returns after the October international break. Yesterday, there was mixed news on the injury front for Pep Guardiola’s side. Omar Marmoush and Rayan Ait-Nouri returned to training and could be available for Manchester City’s clash with Everton. Rodri and Abdukodir Khusanov […] The post A key player for Manchester City is ruled out of their clash with Everton appeared first on Esteemed Kompany.
Sports Mole takes a closer look at Manchester City striker Erling Haaland's record against Everton, including overall wins, goals and assists.

arts.ttl: Manchester City trained earlier today ahead of clash with Everton.
arts.sum: In bad news for Pep Guardiola’s side, Abdukodir Khusanov and Rodri failed to train with their teammates today. Ben Ransom of Sky Sports News has reported via X that Omar Marmoush and Rayan Ait-Nouri have trained with the Manchester City squad today.

arts.ttl: “Grealish factor is a massive blow” for Everton as Man City handed “minor miracle” boost
arts.sum: The absence of Everton’s “main man” Jack Grealish is a “massive blow” for the Toffees ahead of Saturday’s Premier League clash with Manchester City at the Etihad Stadium, Citizens expert Steven McInerney tells Sports Mole.
